channel.title: CVE Feed for WPKube -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPKube -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-4144|2024-05-14T05:33:00.221Z -- wpkube -- Simple Basic Contact Form
item.description: The Simple Basic Contact Form plugin for WordPress for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary shortcode execution in all versions up to, and including, 20240502. This allows unauthenticated attackers to execute arbitrary shortcodes. The severity and exploitability depends on the functionality of other plugins installed in the environment.

item.title: CVE-2024-4150|2024-05-09T20:03:20.930Z -- wpkube -- Simple Basic Contact Form
item.description: The Simple Basic Contact Form plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘scf_email’ parameter in versions up to, and including, 20221201 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-31249|2024-04-10T15:48:21.043Z -- WPKube -- Subscribe To Comments Reloaded
item.description: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File vulnerability in WPKube Subscribe To Comments Reloaded.This issue affects Subscribe To Comments Reloaded: from n/a through 220725.
